name: Vanished (CluelessDev89)
description:
You're going on a picnic with your friends in the woods, but there's something that has been bothering you, something just feels off. When your best friend Jack went to the toilet, he didn't expect something terrible to happen. 

What happened to him?

You will play as:

  • Aiden: a student and Jack's best friend.
  • Abigail: a private detective.
  • Jack: the student that disappeared on the woods.

Can you save Jack and solve the mystery?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*This game will be updated in chapters, more chapters will be added every 1 or 2 months*

Vanished is a horror and dating-sim Visual Novel that will be updated by chapters. Every chapter takes around 25-30 minutes. It is also available in two languages, english and spanish (spanish may have some mistakes, so take it into account). Please report any mistakes if you see one.

Thank you for playing and enjoy the game!

Chapters:
  1. The Disappearance
  2. *Coming soon!*
